title: Apollo
subtitle: God Of Music
description:
Your Move: Your Worker may
move into an opponent Worker’s
space by forcing their Worker to
the space yours just vacated.

title: Artemis
subtitle: Goddess of the Hunt
description:
Your Move: Your Worker may
move one additional time, but not
back to its initial space.

title: Athena
subtitle: Goddess of Wisdom
description:
Opponent’s Turn: If one of your
Workers moved up on your last turn,
opponent Workers cannot
move up this turn.

title: Atlas
subtitle: Titan shouldering the Heavens
description:
Your Build: Your Worker may
build a dome at any level.

title: Demeter
subtitle: Goddess of the Harvest
description:
Your Build: Your Worker may
build one additional time, 
but not on the same space.

title: Hephaestus
subtitle: God of Blacksmiths
description:
Your Build: Your Worker may
build one additional block (not dome)
 on top of your first block.

title: Minotaur
subtitle: Bull-headed Monster
description:
Your Move: Your Worker may
move into an opponent Worker’s
space, if their Worker can be
forced one space straight backwards to an
unoccupied space at any level.

title: Pan
subtitle: God of the Wild
description:
Win Condition: You also win if
your Worker moves down two or
more levels.

title: Prometheus
subtitle: Titan Benefactor of Mankind
description:
Your Turn: If your Worker does
not move up, it may build both
before and after moving.

title: Ares
subtitle: God of War
description:
End of Your Turn: You may
remove an unoccupied block
(not dome) neighboring your
unmoved Worker.

title: Charon
subtitle: Ferryman to the Underworld
description:
Your Move: Before your
Worker moves, you may force a
neighboring opponent Worker
to the space directly on the other side of your
Worker, if that space is unoccupied.

title: Hestia
subtitle: Goddess of Hearth and Home
description:
Your Build: Your Worker may
build one additional time, but this
cannot be on a perimeter space.

title: Selene
subtitle: Goddess of the Moon
description:
Your Build: Instead of your normal build, your
female Worker may build a dome at any level
regardless of which Worker moved.

title: Zeus
subtitle: God of the Sky
description:
Your Build: Your Worker may
build a block under itself.
